meaning_str.bing:
n. 侦探；警探；私人侦探
adj. 侦查(用)的
网络. 侦探的；密探；刑警

警探；私家侦探；刑警；侦查员；侦探的角色（小说、电影、戏剧等）
侦探的；侦查的；侦探用的

1.en: He said he had read the detective novel twice.
1.cn: 他说这部侦探小说他已经读过两次啦。

2.en: So when Tsui returned to his expertise, costume-action movie like this Detective Dee, and he invited me to be part of it, I was there.
2.cn: 所以，当他回到这个古装武侠片的领域，像拍这个《狄仁杰》，然后他邀请我参演，所以我就演喽。

3.en: When an inhibition bites a man, it's a fine novel. When a man up and bites an inhibition, it's only a detective story.
3.cn: 当一种抑制影响到人时，那就是一部好小说。当人占据上风，影响到抑制时，那就只是一篇侦探故事了。

0.en: I am Detective Potato, the world famous detective.
0.cn: 我就是土豆侦探啦，世界上最著名的侦探。

1.en: I am Detective Potato, the world famous detective.
1.cn: 我就是土豆侦探啦，世界上最著名的侦探。

2.en: Yeah, he was really, really scary. Good detective work.
2.cn: 有，他非常，非常吓人。大侦探明察秋毫啊。

3.en: Well done, Peppa. You really are a very good detective.
3.cn: 干得好，佩奇。你真是一位出色的侦探小姐。

4.en: It's a job for a detective. Daddy, what is a detective? A detective is a very important person who is good at finding things.
4.cn: 现在该轮到侦探出场了。可是爸爸，什么是侦探？我所说的侦探呢，他们都是非常厉害的人，能帮别人找到掉了的东西。

5.en: It's a job for a detective. Daddy, what is a detective? A detective is a very important person who is good at finding things.
5.cn: 现在该轮到侦探出场了。可是爸爸，什么是侦探？我所说的侦探呢，他们都是非常厉害的人，能帮别人找到掉了的东西。

6.en: Daddy, when I grow up, I want to be a famous detective. George wants to be a detective, too. If you're going to be detectives, you each need a hat.
6.cn: 爸爸，等我长大了我也要做最著名的侦探。乔治也想成为一个侦探。如果你想成为一个侦探的话，你们就需要一个侦探帽。

7.en: Daddy, when I grow up, I want to be a famous detective. George wants to be a detective, too. If you're going to be detectives, you each need a hat.
7.cn: 爸爸，等我长大了，我也要做最著名的侦探。乔治也想成为一个侦探。如果你想成为一个侦探的话，你们就需要一个侦探帽。

8.en: Me. Me. I'm good at finding things. Alright. Peppa is the detective. George. I am the detective. I will help you find Mr. Dinosaur.
8.cn: 好的，佩琪来做侦探吧。乔治，我现在是侦探了。我会帮你找到恐龙先生的。

9.en: Me. Me. I'm good at finding things. Alright. Peppa is the detective. George. I am the detective. I will help you find Mr. Dinosaur.
9.cn: 好的，佩奇来做侦探吧。乔治，我现在是侦探了。我会帮你找到恐龙先生的。

10.en: Oh. Please help me, Mr. Detective. I can not find my flower anywhere. Your flower is on the top of your head. Oh, thank you, Mr. Detective.
10.cn: 噢！请你帮帮我，侦探先生。我到处都找不到我的花。你的花现在就在你的头上。噢谢谢你侦探先生。

11.en: You can have your own, you know, health inspector detective show.
11.cn: 你可以当卫生稽查员兼侦探了。

12.en: I thought you came to say you were sick. All right, Professor or detective?
12.cn: 你是过来说你生病的。你到底是教授还是侦探？

13.en: Well done, Peppa. You really are a very good detective. DineDine SawSaw.
13.cn: 干得好，佩琪。你真是一位出色的侦探小姐。恐龙。

14.en: Yeah, I'm a detective and I solve crimes with the help of my robot partner.
14.cn: 我是个侦探，和我的机器人拍档，一起打击犯罪。

15.en: The mystery is solved. Do you still want to be a detective when you grow up, Peppa?
15.cn: 神秘事件解决了。你们长大后还是想做侦探吗，佩奇？

16.en: The mystery is solved. Do you still want to be a detective when you grow up, Peppa?
16.cn: 神秘事件解决了。你们长大后还是想做侦探吗，佩奇？

17.en: I keep telling him, if he was any good as a detective, I wouldn't need a new mantel.
17.cn: 我总说，如果他是个好侦探，我就不用换新壁炉架了。

18.en: Peppa and her family are watching their favorite television program, Detective Potato.
18.cn: 佩奇和她的家人正在观看她们最喜欢的电视节目，土豆侦探。

19.en: Peppa and her family are watching their favorite television program, Detective Potato.
19.cn: 佩奇和她的家人正在观看她们最喜欢的电视节目，土豆侦探。
